pGaurds.name: Luka Doncic
pGaurds.description: Luka Doncic has been on an incredible 2022-2023 season, being the first ever player to get a 60/20/10 triple double. With his high Assist Ratio, shot percentage, and incredible playmaking skills; Luka deserves to be on the top of this list.

pGaurds.name: Damian Lillard
pGaurds.description: Damian Lillard has also had a great 2023 season. With a Higher point average then Shai, but lower field goal percentage. With slightly worse stats to Shai, Damian should be right behind him at number 2.

pGaurds.name: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander
pGaurds.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander has been having a tremendous season this year. Averaging 30.9 points per game and a high Field goal percentage, Shai makes his way to the number 3 spot.
